California State University San Bernardino


Welcome to the 2022-23 Academic Catalog for California State University San Bernardino. 
Although every effort has been made to assure the accuracy of the information, students and others should note that laws, rules, policies, programs, and courses change from time to time and that these changes may alter the information contained in the 2022-23 Catalog. Review Changes of Rules and Policies for more information.
